title: An antiquodlibet, or An aduertisement to beware of secular priests
author: Fenner, Dudley, 1558?-1587, attributed name.
publisher: By R. Schilders, printer to the states of Zealand,
notes: Attributed to Dudley Fenner and to John Udall.--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue.
A reply to STC 25123: Watson, William.  A decacordion of ten quodlibetical questions.
Running title reads: An antiquodlibet to beware of secular priests.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
